Title: Relates to increasing the earnings limitation for positions of public service
Summary: Relates to increasing the earnings limitation for positions of public service; increases the earnings limitation from $35,000 to $50,000 in 2025 and thereafter.
LawCode: Amd ยง212, R & SS L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the retirement and social security law, in relation to increasing the earning limitations for retired persons in positions of public service
